title: Strengthening E-Learning Competencies: Integrating ICT and UDL in Instructional Design for Inclusive Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three multimodal representations of science learning materials applying UDL principles.
Learners can develop inclusive assessment methods tailored to individual learner needs using ICT tools.
Learners can analyze science learning support strategies by disability type and apply them to real educational scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
